Sentencas: This paper presents a stack concept that can be applied to both molten carbonate fuel cell (MCFC) and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) internal reforming stacks.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: It employs anode recycle and allows the design of very simple system configurations, while giving enhanced efficiencies and high specific power densities.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The recycle of anode exit gas to the anode inlet has previously been proposed as a means of preventing carbon deposition in direct internal reforming (DIR) stacks.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: When applied to a normal stack this reduces the Nernst voltages because the recycle stream is relatively depleted in hydrogen.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: In the concept proposed here, known as the 'Smarter' stack, there are two anode exit streams, one of which is depleted, while the other is relatively undepleted.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The depleted stream passes directly to the burner, and the undepleted stream is recycled to the stack inlet.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: By this means high Nernst voltages are achieved in the stack.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The concept has been simulated and assessed for parallel-flow and cross-flow MCFC and SOFC stacks and graphs are presented showing temperature distributions.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The 'Smarter' stacks employ a high recycle rate resulting in a reduced natural gas concentration at the stack inlet, and this reduces or eliminates the unfavourable temperature dip.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: Catalyst grading can further improve the temperature distribution.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The concept allows simple system configurations in which the need for fuel pre-heat is eliminated.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: Efficiencies are up to 10 percentage points higher than for conventional stacks with the same cell area and maximum stack temperature.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks

Sentencas: The concept presented here was devised in a project part-funded by the EU, and has been adopted by the European Advanced DIR-MCFC development programme led by BCN.
Titulo: A novel configuration for direct internal reforming stacks
